Odin
Genre(s)
Heavy Metal
Lyrical theme(s)
Girls, love, rock
Origin 	Formed in 	Last label 	Status
United States of America (Los Angeles, California) 	1983 	Victor/Perris Records 	On hold
Last known line-up
Randy O. Roberg - Vocals
Jeff Duncan - Guitars (Armored Saint, Bird of Prey, DC4)
Aaron Samson - Bass
Shawn Duncan - Drums (Bird of Prey, Madam X, DC4)
Former/past member(s)
Mark Weisz - Vocals (Impellitteri)
Jimmy Tavis - Bass
Brad Parker - Guitars
Tim Kelly - Guitars
Tony Devita - Vocals (New Eden)
Additional notes
Brad Parker, who was a guitarist in Odin at some point, played one gig with Metallica, April 23rd, 1982.
The band was featured in the movie "The Decline of Western Civilization Part 2: The Metal Years."
